Title: John Carpenter's Cigarette Burns
Plot: In this episode Jimmy Sweetman ventures out to locate a rare film print called "Le Fin Du Monde"¬ù. The film once shown has been known to drive its audience into a crazed frenzy before the theatre goes up in flames.  He finally discovers that the film does live up to it's reputation on the results are quite shocking.
ParentalRatingReason: R18 Violence and content that may disturb
